4.6. manager.qwidgetComponent¶

qwidgetComponent.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
This module defines the QWidgetComponent class.

Others:

4.6.1. Module Attributes¶

manager.qwidgetComponent.LOGGER¶

4.6.2. Functions¶

manager.qwidgetComponent.QWidgetComponentFactory(uiFile=None, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

This definition is a class factory creating QWidgetComponent classes using given ui file.

Parameters:
  • uiFile – Ui file. ( String )
  • *args – Arguments. ( * )
  • **kwargs – Keywords arguments. ( ** )
Returns:

QWidgetComponent class. ( QWidgetComponent )
